description:
Sullivan came in to do a solo and an oral video, but he has a new girlfriend, and I think he pretty much thought doing a Serviced video would be considered cheating.
Bishop was in town to do the honors, so sadly he to go home empty mouthed.
Sullivan loves the outdoors. Hiking, camping, running, and kayaking. He likes to rough it, and has that lean muscle mass (and scrapes!) to go with it.
He is a quiet guy, so don't have a lot of back story on him. He said he had done a solo over 5 years ago, and talked a lot about traveling the U.S. with his buddies.
Sullivan's cumshot is spectacular, and I think I put an amazing camcap of just one of the many ropes of cum that fly out of him.
Not sure what the guy is eating, but his 'output' is tremendous!
title: Sullivan - Solo
